column2: an A.M. Eatery////Pretty F-ing good ya'll. I had a few bites off my friends plate and had a coffee of my own. The service was really fast. Weird paying system though
column3: you guys. It was EXTREMELY complicated to pay because they set us all up on one check. We did not look like a family
column4: just a bunch of rag-tag adults up to no good. They would not give us a way to pay except through an electronic system
column5: which made us wait for a good long while when trying to leave. I enjoyed the patio. I enjoyed the wait staff. My friends were a little picky and our associate did not wig out. They handled us well. :) I might not have. ;)
